title: Mozilla vendor-prefixed CSS extensions
summary: Firefox supports a number of Mozilla extensions to CSS, including properties, values, pseudo-elements and pseudo-classes, at-rules, and media queries. These extensions are prefixed with -moz-.
pageTitle: Mozilla vendor-prefixed CSS extensions - CSS: Cascading Style Sheets | MDN
